participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Calm and introspective, Lila finds peace in silence and deeply values spiritual experiences.
participant_1.background: i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i have not spoken in three months. i live in alaska. i like meditation. i'm a buddhist.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and a bit anxious, Jake often seeks reassurance from others and enjoys creative activities.
participant_2.background: i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. i've a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.
